svg.text: The SkoFlo Low Flow series adjusts the flow set point by simultaneously varying a restrictor (Cv) and controlling the internal pressure drop (DP) across that restrictor. As DP is independent of system pressure changes, flow is stable in all field conditions.

g.text: Pressure drop across valve is below specifications - please increase inlet or decrease outlet pressure
To demonstrate, click the arrows to adjust field pressures and valve setpoint
Throttling points consume majority of pressure drop
